text: @realDonaldTrump About that #TulsaTrumpRally ~ how are those #Trump supporters going to feel after your rally causes their city to shut down again after the #COVID19 cases and deaths start hugely increasing? And maybe affects their own loved ones? Your ego causes your own demise.
